main event: A civilian observed a small light grey object shaped like an egg hovering and then departing at a high rate of speed in Rawlins, Wyoming.
interesting points: The object hovered for about half a minute before accelerating away out of sight in about 10 seconds., The object was described as too small to be a meteorite., The observer reported that the sighting occurred through a window and involved a direct visual observation., The object moved in a straight line flight path from west to east., The observer's CB radio was knocked off during the sighting, suggesting possible interference.
sighted object: a small light grey egg-shaped object
witness description: Civilian, Mr. T. B., Age 59, employed by the City of Rawlins
